provider.name: Bank Zachodni WBK
provider.instruction:
You can find your NIK (Customer Identification Number) in BZWBK24 agreement on electronic banking services.

  • If you opened your current account using Internet or phone, the password was sent to you by text message or mail.
  • If you opened your current account with electronic banking services at one of the Bank's branches, you received a password in a sealed envelope from the Bank’s staff.

If you do not remember your password, please visit one of the Bank's branches in order to generate a new one.

If you wish to sign an agreement on electronic banking services, please visit one of the Bank's branches where the Bank’s staff will activate BZWBK24 system for you.
provider.author: AnyBalance Team <info@anybalance.ru>
